name: Corrupted Balance
description:
This is game for VanJam. In this game world lost its balance so now everything lost its colour and got corrupted.

Everything is random like size of enemies, their hp, shooting speed, and speed(there is more random things).

This Game fits the theme because you are trying to bring balance back.

I did all the code and art myself(you will notice art 100% I am bad at it).

And yea here you go.

Play

Now.
